description: The family will love this nutrionally approved spaghetti bolognese recipe made with wholewheat pasta. It's perfect if you're looking for a healthier midweek dinner.
keywords: Mains,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Mince,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Healthier Spaghetti Bolognese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Macro Organic chunky bolognese pasta sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium heat. Add onion, carrot and celery, then cook for 5 minutes or until vegetables have just softened. Add mince and cook, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 5 minutes or until browned. Add pasta sauce, paste and vinegar, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes or until mixture has thickened slightly. Season with pepper.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain. Return to saucepan.
Spoon bolognese over pasta. Top with tomato, basil and parmesan. Serve with mixed leaves.
